SvMonitorCommonAttr.label: Depends Condition
SvMonitorCommonAttr.description: If OK, this monitor is only enabled if the Depends On monitor is OK.

SvMonitorCommonAttr.label: Depends On
SvMonitorCommonAttr.description: Choose the monitor that this monitor depends on

SvMonitorCommonAttr.label: Report Description
SvMonitorCommonAttr.description: additional description of monitor that appears on Reports and in monitor popup info (optional)

SvMonitorCommonAttr.label: Disable
SvMonitorCommonAttr.description: temporarily disable monitor sampling and alerting

SvMonitorCommonAttr.label: Update every (on errors)
SvMonitorCommonAttr.description: the amount of time between checks whenever the status of the monitor is not ok; the Update value from above is used if this is left blank

SvMonitorCommonAttr.label: Update every
SvMonitorCommonAttr.description: amount of time between checks of a monitor

SvMonitorCommonAttr.label: Monitor Description
SvMonitorCommonAttr.description: additional description of monitor that appears on Monitor Detail page (optional)

SvMonitorCommonAttr.label: Title
SvMonitorCommonAttr.description: title that should appear in the Monitor table (optional)

SvMonitorCommonAttr.label: Stop Logging To %1
SvMonitorCommonAttr.description: Check this box to not log the data for this monitor to %1

SvMonitorCommonAttr.label: Schedule
SvMonitorCommonAttr.description: schedule for the monitor to be enabled - for example, "weekdays, 9-6" enables the monitor to run from 9am to 6pm, Monday - Friday

SvMonitorCommonAttr.label: Verify Error
SvMonitorCommonAttr.description:
if the monitor detects an error, immediately perform the check again to verify the error.
  • WARNINGS:
  • (1) Activating this feature will cause the logging of this monitor's initial error state to be skipped. Potentially valuable statistical information will be lost.
  • (2) This feature causes immediate re-execution of the monitor. Promiscuous use of this feature may delay the scheduled runs of other monitors.
  • (3) This feature is independent from the Update every (on errors) feature below.

SvMonitorCommonAttr.label: Monitor Template
SvMonitorCommonAttr.description: monitor template to use for this monitor
